item.title: Language identification with fastText
item.author: ricardo.anderegg@gmail.com (Ricardo Ander-Egg)
item.description: When dealing with a multilingual dataset doing language identification is a very important part of the analysis process, here I’ll show a way to do a fast ⚡️ and reliable ✨ languague identification with fasttext.
